verses.name: Romans 1:28
verses.text: And even as they did not like to retain God in their knowledge, God gave them over to a reprobate mind, to do those things which are not convenient;

verses.name: Romans 1:29
verses.text: Being filled with all unrighteousness, fornication, wickedness, covetousness, maliciousness; full of envy, murder, debate, deceit, malignity; whisperers,

verses.name: Romans 1:30
verses.text: Backbiters, haters of God, despiteful, proud, boasters, inventors of evil things, disobedient to parents,

verses.name: Romans 1:31
verses.text: Without understanding, covenantbreakers, without natural affection, implacable, unmerciful:

verses.name: Romans 1:32
verses.text: Who knowing the judgment of God, that they which commit such things are worthy of death, not only do the same, but have pleasure in them that do them.
